mapper.insert: INSERT INTO redirection (account_id, name, url, created_at, updated_at, expire_at, visit_limit, redirection_page, user_disabled) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{name}, #{url}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{expireAt}, #{visitLimit}, #{redirectionPage}, #{userDisabled});
mapper.update: UPDATE redirection SET update_at = #{settings.updateAt}, expire_at = #{settings.expireAt}, visit_limit = #{settings.visitLimit}, redirection_page = #{settings.redirectionPage}, user_disabled = #{settings.userDisabled} WHERE id = #{id};
